subject: Missing item
description_text:
Dear Simsonn!

Today I received my order (#SSN3783). It arrived in good condition, but unfortunately it was incomplete — along with the VAM Set, I found only 2 piece L-Shaped Mounting Bracket.
Please kindly send the missing item.
Thank you,

Gabor Bernhardt

conversations.body_text: Hi Bernhardt Gábor,    Please provide a photo, and we'll verify with our warehouse. We'll arrange a replacement shipment as soon as possible—no need to worry.
Hi Bernhardt Gábor,    We apologize for the inconvenience caused. We will resend it to you as soon as possible.

Thank you in advance!

I saw on the website, that there are available new Vertical Mounting Brackets.
Can you send for me 1 item from this bracket? I'm going to order two more later. Are they compatible with the VAM set I ordered before?

Thank you!

Gabor


________________________________
Feladó: service@simsonn.com

Dear Simsonn!

I still doesnt received any update about this missing item. Please respond whats happening.
It is really frustrating, I paid a lot of money for a pedal set with base plate(base plate still not here, ordered it 21st of November), and a haptic set, and part of them still not here.
I waiting for 1 package, need to be here soon, if something is missing from what I ordered, I'm gonna ask a full refund, because it's unacceptable.

Regards,
Gabor Bernhardt
________________________________
Feladó: service@simsonn.com

Hi Bernhardt Gábor,        I apologize for not getting back to you sooner. I see your base plate package is about to arrive—please don't worry. Also, is there anything else you need?  https://t.17track.net/en#nums=JSELI0279354123YQ
